issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Not able to debug in Android, I can debug ios simulator and device all through jscontext in iOS but not able to do same on Android. 

Is there anyway to do it on Android?

comments.body:
Anyone please reply me on this issue.

Looking forward to hear from you soon!

Thanks

Hello,

Thanks for reaching with us. Which studio version are you using?

Axway Appcelerator Studio, build: 5.1.1.201809051655
(c) Copyright 2018 by Axway.  All Rights Reserved.

Build: jenkins-appcelerator-studio-titanium_studio-master-38 (master)
Date: 201809051655

[~ppancholi],

Ok. Thanks for your reply.  Is breakpoint working perfectly on your end? Can you please test again using s simple test case on 7.5.0.GA again and let us know how it goes. It would be helpful if you can share your complete console log, test case to reproduce this on our end?

Hello,

Just passing as update here. Are you able to get that sorted out?  Please let us know if you need more help with this issue.

Regards,
Rakhi
No, It has not been resolved yet, I did not get any output from you, Still waiting for response on it.

Hello,

We are investigating this issue on our end using a breakpoint. It seems a studio issue. Getting stuck on debug window in couple of mins. Did you experiencing the same? Is debug window opening perfectly on your end? It would be helpful if you share your sample test code, full environment details and screenshot which displays the issue.
Check the [screenshot |https://i.postimg.cc/7LqW51mg/Screen-Shot-2018-12-06-at-12-18-13-PM.png].

Thanks

Hello,
We have not heard back from you since our last update.I just wanted to follow up with you about this issue? Are you still experiencing this problem?
Please let us know if you need more help with this issue.

Thanks
[~ppancholi], we have newer updates to Studio. Can you please try the latest Studio 5.1.2 RC version? Thank you.
